parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The identifier of this element used to reference it in other components

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: method
parameter.description: HTTP request method name.

parameter.name: maskedRequestPath
parameter.description: OData request path, relative to listener.

parameter.name: scheme
parameter.description: HTTP request scheme.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Request host.

parameter.name: listenerPath
parameter.description: Listener path, ending with "*".

parameter.name: httpHeaders
parameter.description: HTTP request headers.

parameter.name: queryString
parameter.description: HTTP query string.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: entityTypeName
parameter.description: Entity type name specified by the Entity Data Model.

parameter.name: entityTypeFields
parameter.description: List of property fields from the Entity type.

parameter.name: entityTypeKeys
parameter.description: Map of entity key names and values.

parameter.name: systemQueryOptions
parameter.description: System Query Options map. The grammar and syntax rules for system query options are defined in [OData-ABNF], in order to simplify usability we remove initial dollar sign to avoid escaping withing dataweave, in example to access System Query Option $skip user should use the following expresion #[attributes.systemQueryOptions.'skip']

parameter.name: searchTransformationEnabled
parameter.description: Enables $search transformation to WHERE clause.

parameter.name: strictSearchTermMatch
parameter.description: Enables full term match for $search. If enabled, terms in WHERE clause are not enclosed between '%'.

parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: primaryNodeOnly
parameter.description: Whether this source should only be executed on the primary node when runnning in Cluster

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: redeliveryPolicy
parameter.description: Defines a policy for processing the redelivery of the same message

type.name: org.mule.extension.api.routing.ListenerRequestAttributes
type.description:
Set of request attributes targeted for the "On Entity Request" and "On Entity Collection Request" listener.
@since 1.0

type.name: org.mule.extension.api.routing.RouteOutputAttributes
type.description:
Output attributes resulting from the router and returned back to the HTTP listener.
@since 1.0

type.name: org.mule.extension.api.serialization.CollectionSuccessResponse
type.description:
Identifies a success response of entity collections which might include server side pagination parameters.
@since 1.0

type.name: org.mule.extension.api.serialization.EntityCollectionSuccessResponse

parameter.name: bodyContent
parameter.description: The body of the response message.

parameter.name: serializationParameters
parameter.description: Set of serialization-related parameters.

type.name: org.mule.extension.api.serialization.EntitySuccessResponse

parameter.name: bodyContent
parameter.description: The body of the response message.

type.name: org.mule.extension.api.serialization.RawEntityCollectionSuccessResponse
type.description:
Raw content of a success response that represents an entity collection.
@since 1.0

parameter.name: rawContent
parameter.description: The raw response message.

type.name: org.mule.extension.api.serialization.RawEntitySuccessResponse
type.description:
Raw content of a success response that represents a single entity.
@since 1.0

parameter.name: rawContent
parameter.description: The raw response content of the response message.

type.name: org.mule.extension.api.serialization.SuccessResponse
type.description:
Identifies a success response that is composed by a content and optional parameters.
@since 1.0

type.name: org.mule.extension.api.transformation.SQLTransformerOutputAttributes
type.description:
Output attributes resulting from the execution of the SQL transformation.
@since 1.0
